description.en_US: Batch convert the documents of Siyuan Notes into Markdown files, and support the conversion properties of FrontFormatter corresponding to Hexo, HUGO, Vitepress, Obsidian and other platforms
description.zh_CN:
将思源笔记的文档批量转换为Markdown文件，支持转换属性为Hexo、HUGO、Vitepress、Obsidian等平台对应的FrontFormatter
️
